text.text_translated: Most people believe that developing countries are in a terrible situation, where people suffer from extreme poverty, are ruled by dictators and have little hope for any meaningful change. However, this idea is very different from the truth, because a great transformation is actually happening. In the last 20 years, more than 700 million people have started to earn more money and have escaped poverty. Additionally, six million fewer children die from disease every year, millions more girls are going to school, and many more people now have access to clean water.
